Package net.officefloor.server

Interface ResponseWriter

  • public interface ResponseWriter
    Writes the response.
    Author:
    Daniel Sagenschneider

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void closeConnection​(java.lang.Throwable failure)
      Indicates failure processing connection.

      Executes the SocketRunnable on the Socket Thread.
      StreamBufferPool<java.nio.ByteBuffer> getStreamBufferPool()

    • Method Detail

      • getStreamBufferPool

        StreamBufferPool<java.nio.ByteBuffer> getStreamBufferPool()
        Obtains the StreamBufferPool.
        Returns:
        StreamBufferPool.

      • execute

        void execute​(SocketRunnable runnable)
        Executes the SocketRunnable on the Socket Thread.
        Parameters:
        runnable - SocketRunnable.

      • write

        void write​(ResponseHeaderWriter responseHeaderWriter,
           StreamBuffer<java.nio.ByteBuffer> headResponseBuffer)
        Writes the StreamBuffer instances as the response.
        Parameters:
        responseHeaderWriter - ResponseHeaderWriter.
        headResponseBuffer - Head StreamBuffer for the linked list of StreamBuffer instances for the response. Once the StreamBuffer is written back to the Socket, it is released back to its StreamBufferPool.

      • closeConnection

        void closeConnection​(java.lang.Throwable failure)

        Indicates failure processing connection.

        Should there be an unrecoverable failure of the connection, this enables closing the connection.

        Parameters:
        failure - Cause of the failure.
